Logical.name: IFERROR
Logical.description: Returns a different result if the first argument evaluates to an error

Logical.name: NOT
Logical.description: Reverses the logic of its argument

Logical.name: OR
Logical.description: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE

Logical.name: AND
Logical.description: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE

Logical.name: IF
Logical.description: Specifies a logical test to perform

Statistical.name: AVERAGEIF
Statistical.description: Returns the average for the cells specified by a given criterion

Statistical.name: AVERAGEIFS
Statistical.description: Returns the average for the cells specified by multiple criteria

Statistical.name: COUNTIFS
Statistical.description: Counts the number of cells that meet multiple criteria

Statistical.name: COUNTBLANK
Statistical.description: Counts the number of blank cells in the argument range

Statistical.name: AVEDEV
Statistical.description: Returns the average of the absolute deviations of data points from their mean

Statistical.name: AVERAGE
Statistical.description: Returns the average of its arguments

Statistical.name: AVERAGEA
Statistical.description: Returns the average of its arguments and includes evaluation of text and logical values

Statistical.name: BETADIST
Statistical.description: Returns the cumulative beta probability density function

Statistical.name: BETAINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the cumulative beta probability density function

Statistical.name: BINOMDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the individual term binomial distribution probability

Statistical.name: CHIDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the one-tailed probability of the chi-squared distribution

Statistical.name: CHIINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the one-tailed probability of the chi-squared distribution

Statistical.name: CHITEST
Statistical.description: Returns the test for independence

Statistical.name: CONFIDENCE
Statistical.description: Returns the confidence interval for a population mean

Statistical.name: CORREL
Statistical.description: Returns the correlation coefficient between two data sets

Statistical.name: COUNT
Statistical.description: Counts how many numbers are in the list of arguments

Statistical.name: COUNTA
Statistical.description: Counts how many values are in the list of arguments

Statistical.name: COVAR
Statistical.description: Returns covariance, the average of the products of paired deviations

Statistical.name: CRITBINOM
Statistical.description: Returns the smallest value for which the cumulative binomial distribution is less than or equal to a criterion value

Statistical.name: DEVSQ
Statistical.description: Returns the sum of squares of deviations

Statistical.name: EXPONDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the exponential distribution

Statistical.name: FDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the F probability distribution

Statistical.name: FINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the F probability distribution

Statistical.name: FISHER
Statistical.description: Returns the Fisher transformation

Statistical.name: FISHERINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the Fisher transformation

Statistical.name: FORECAST
Statistical.description: Returns a value along a linear trend

Statistical.name: FREQUENCY
Statistical.description: Returns a frequency distribution as a vertical array

Statistical.name: FTEST
Statistical.description: Returns the result of an F-Test

Statistical.name: GAMMADIST
Statistical.description: Returns the gamma distribution

Statistical.name: GAMMAINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the gamma cumulative distribution

Statistical.name: GAMMALN
Statistical.description: Returns the natural logarithm of the gamma function, G(x)

Statistical.name: GEOMEAN
Statistical.description: Returns the geometric mean

Statistical.name: GROWTH
Statistical.description: Returns values along an exponential trend

Statistical.name: HARMEAN
Statistical.description: Returns the harmonic mean

Statistical.name: HYPGEOMDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the hypergeometric distribution

Statistical.name: INTERCEPT
Statistical.description: Returns the intercept of the linear regression line

Statistical.name: KURT
Statistical.description: Returns the kurtosis of a data set

Statistical.name: LARGE
Statistical.description: Returns the kth largest value in a data set

Statistical.name: LOGINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the lognormal distribution

Statistical.name: LOGNORMDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the cumulative lognormal distribution

Statistical.name: MAX
Statistical.description: Returns the maximum value in a list of arguments, ignoring logical values and text

Statistical.name: MAXA
Statistical.description: Returns the maximum value in a list of arguments, including logical values and text

Statistical.name: MEDIAN
Statistical.description: Returns the median of the given numbers

Statistical.name: MIN
Statistical.description: Returns the minimum value in a list of arguments, ignoring logical values and text

Statistical.name: MINA
Statistical.description: Returns the minimum value in a list of arguments, including logical values and text

Statistical.name: MODE
Statistical.description: Returns the most common value in a data set

Statistical.name: NEGBINOMDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the negative binomial distribution

Statistical.name: NORMDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the normal cumulative distribution

Statistical.name: NORMINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the normal cumulative distribution

Statistical.name: NORMSDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the standard normal cumulative distribution

Statistical.name: NORMSINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution

Statistical.name: PEARSON
Statistical.description: Returns the Pearson product moment correlation coefficient

Statistical.name: PERCENTILE
Statistical.description: Returns the kth percentile of values in a range

Statistical.name: PERCENTRANK
Statistical.description: Returns the percentage rank of a value in a data set

Statistical.name: PERMUT
Statistical.description: Returns the number of permutations for a given number of objects

Statistical.name: POISSON
Statistical.description: Returns the Poisson distribution

Statistical.name: PROB
Statistical.description: Returns the probability that values in a range are between two limits

Statistical.name: QUARTILE
Statistical.description: Returns the quartile of a data set

Statistical.name: RANK
Statistical.description: Returns the rank of a number in a list of numbers

Statistical.name: RSQ
Statistical.description: Returns the square of the Pearson product moment correlation coefficient

Statistical.name: SKEW
Statistical.description: Returns the skewness of a distribution

Statistical.name: SLOPE
Statistical.description: Returns the slope of the linear regression line

Statistical.name: SMALL
Statistical.description: Returns the kth smallest value in a data set

Statistical.name: STANDARDIZE
Statistical.description: Returns a normalized value

Statistical.name: STDEV
Statistical.description: Estimates standard deviation based on a sample, ignoring text and logical values

Statistical.name: STDEVA
Statistical.description: Estimates standard deviation based on a sample, including text and logical values

Statistical.name: STDEVP
Statistical.description: Calculates standard deviation based on the entire population, ignoring text and logical values

Statistical.name: STDEVPA
Statistical.description: Calculates standard deviation based on the entire population, including text and logical values

Statistical.name: STEYX
Statistical.description: Returns the standard error of the predicted y-value for each x in the regression

Statistical.name: TDIST
Statistical.description: Returns the student’s t-distribution

Statistical.name: TINV
Statistical.description: Returns the inverse of the student’s t-distribution

Statistical.name: TREND
Statistical.description: Returns values along a linear trend

Statistical.name: TRIMMEAN
Statistical.description: Returns the mean of the interior of a data set

Statistical.name: TTEST
Statistical.description: Returns the probability associated with a student’s t-Test

Statistical.name: VAR
Statistical.description: Estimates variance based on a sample, ignoring logical values and text

Statistical.name: VARA
Statistical.description: Estimates variance based on a sample, including logical values and text

Statistical.name: VARP
Statistical.description: Calculates variance based on the entire population, ignoring logical values and text

Statistical.name: VARPA
Statistical.description: Calculates variance based on the entire population, including logical values and text

Statistical.name: WEIBULL
Statistical.description: Returns the Weibull distribution

Statistical.name: ZTEST
Statistical.description: Returns the two-tailed P-value of a z-test

Statistical.name: LINEST
Statistical.description: Returns the parameters of a linear trend

Statistical.name: LOGEST
Statistical.description: Returns the parameters of an exponential trend

Statistical.name: COUNTIF
Statistical.description: Counts the number of cells that meet the criteria you specify in the argument

Math & Trig.name: SUMIFS
Math & Trig.description: Adds the cells specified by a multiple criteria

Math & Trig.name: ABS
Math & Trig.description: Returns the absolute value of a number

Math & Trig.name: ACOS
Math & Trig.description: Returns the arccosine of a number

Math & Trig.name: ACOSH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine of a number

Math & Trig.name: ASIN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the arcsine of a number

Math & Trig.name: ASINH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine of a number

Math & Trig.name: ATAN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the arctangent of a number

Math & Trig.name: ATAN2
Math & Trig.description: Returns the arctangent from x and y coordinates

Math & Trig.name: ATANH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of a number

Math & Trig.name: CEILING
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer or to the nearest multiple of significance

Math & Trig.name: COMBIN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the number of combinations for a given number of objects

Math & Trig.name: COS
Math & Trig.description: Returns the cosine of a number

Math & Trig.name: COSH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of a number

Math & Trig.name: DEGREES
Math & Trig.description: Converts radians to degrees

Math & Trig.name: EVEN
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest even integer

Math & Trig.name: EXP
Math & Trig.description: Returns e raised to the power of a given number

Math & Trig.name: FACT
Math & Trig.description: Returns the factorial of a number

Math & Trig.name: FACTDOUBLE
Math & Trig.description: Returns the double factorial of a number

Math & Trig.name: FLOOR
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number down, toward 0

Math & Trig.name: GCD
Math & Trig.description: Returns the greatest common divisor

Math & Trig.name: INT
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer

Math & Trig.name: LCM
Math & Trig.description: Returns the least common multiple

Math & Trig.name: LN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the natural logarithm of a number

Math & Trig.name: LOG
Math & Trig.description: Returns the logarithm of a number to a specified base

Math & Trig.name: LOG10
Math & Trig.description: Returns the base-10 logarithm of a number

Math & Trig.name: MDETERM
Math & Trig.description: Returns the matrix determinant of an array

Math & Trig.name: MOD
Math & Trig.description: Returns the remainder from division

Math & Trig.name: MROUND
Math & Trig.description: Returns a number rounded to the desired multiple

Math & Trig.name: MULTINOMIAL
Math & Trig.description: Returns the multinomial of a set of numbers

Math & Trig.name: ODD
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest odd integer

Math & Trig.name: PI
Math & Trig.description: Returns the value of pi

Math & Trig.name: POWER
Math & Trig.description: Returns the result of a number raised to a power

Math & Trig.name: PRODUCT
Math & Trig.description: Multiplies its arguments

Math & Trig.name: QUOTIENT
Math & Trig.description: Returns the integer portion of a division

Math & Trig.name: RADIANS
Math & Trig.description: Converts degrees to radians

Math & Trig.name: RAND
Math & Trig.description: Returns a random number between 0 and 1

Math & Trig.name: RANDBETWEEN
Math & Trig.description: Returns a random number between the numbers that you specify

Math & Trig.name: ROMAN
Math & Trig.description: Converts an Arabic numeral to Roman, as text

Math & Trig.name: ROUND
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number to a specified number of digits

Math & Trig.name: ROUNDDOWN
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number down, toward 0

Math & Trig.name: ROUNDUP
Math & Trig.description: Rounds a number up, away from 0

Math & Trig.name: SERIESSUM
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of a power series based on the formula

Math & Trig.name: SIGN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sign of a number

Math & Trig.name: SIN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sine of the given angle

Math & Trig.name: SQRT
Math & Trig.description: Returns a positive square root

Math & Trig.name: SQRTPI
Math & Trig.description: Returns the square root of pi

Math & Trig.name: SUBTOTAL
Math & Trig.description: Returns a subtotal in a list or database

Math & Trig.name: SUM
Math & Trig.description: Adds its arguments

Math & Trig.name: SUMIF
Math & Trig.description: Adds the cells specified by a given criteria

Math & Trig.name: SUMPRODUCT
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of the products of corresponding array components

Math & Trig.name: SUMSQ
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of the squares of the arguments

Math & Trig.name: SUMX2MY2
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of the difference of squares of corresponding values in two arrays

Math & Trig.name: SUMX2PY2
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of the sum of squares of corresponding values in two arrays

Math & Trig.name: SUMXMY2
Math & Trig.description: Returns the sum of squares of differences of corresponding values in two arrays

Math & Trig.name: TAN
Math & Trig.description: Returns the tangent of a number

Math & Trig.name: TANH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of a number

Math & Trig.name: TRUNC
Math & Trig.description: Truncates a number (you specify the precision of the truncation)

Math & Trig.name: MINVERSE
Math & Trig.description: Returns the matrix inverse of an array

Math & Trig.name: MMULT
Math & Trig.description: Returns the matrix product of two arrays

Math & Trig.name: SINH
Math & Trig.description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of a number

Cube.name: CUBEMEMBER
Cube.description: Returns a member or tuple in a cube hierarchy

Cube.name: CUBEVALUE
Cube.description: Returns an aggregated value from a cube

Cube.name: CUBESET
Cube.description: Defines a calculated set of members or tuples by sending a set expression to the cube on the server

Cube.name: CUBERANKEDMEMBER
Cube.description: Returns the nth, or ranked, member in a set

Cube.name: CUBEKPIMEMBER
Cube.description: Returns a key performance indicator name, property, and measure, and displays the name and property in the cell.

Cube.name: CUBEMEMBERPROPERTY
Cube.description: Returns the value of a member property in the cube

Cube.name: CUBESETCOUNT
Cube.description: Returns the number of items in a set

Database.name: DAVERAGE
Database.description: Averages the values in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DCOUNT
Database.description: Counts the cells that contain numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DCOUNTA
Database.description: Counts the nonblank cells in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DGET
Database.description: Extracts a single value from a column of a list or database that matches conditions you specify

Database.name: DMAX
Database.description: Returns the largest number in a column of a list or database that matches conditions you specify

Database.name: DMIN
Database.description: Returns the smallest number in a column of a list or database that matches conditions you specify

Database.name: DPRODUCT
Database.description: Multiplies the values in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DSTDEV
Database.description: Estimates the standard deviation of a population based on a sample by using the numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DSTDEVP
Database.description: Calculates the standard deviation of a population based on the entire population, using the numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DSUM
Database.description: Adds the numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DVAR
Database.description: Estimates the variance of a population based on a sample by using the numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Database.name: DVARP
Database.description: Calculates the variance of a population based on the entire population by using the numbers in a column of a list or database that match conditions you specify

Date & Time.name: DATE
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of a particular date

Date & Time.name: DATEVALUE
Date & Time.description: Converts a date in the form of text to a serial number

Date & Time.name: DAY
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a day of the month

Date & Time.name: DAYS360
Date & Time.description: Calculates the number of days between two dates, based on a 360-day year

Date & Time.name: EDATE
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of the date that is the indicated number of months before or after the start date

Date & Time.name: EOMONTH
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of the last day of the month before or after a specified number of months

Date & Time.name: HOUR
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to an hour

Date & Time.name: MINUTE
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a minute

Date & Time.name: MONTH
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a month

Date & Time.name: NETWORKDAYS
Date & Time.description: Returns the number of whole workdays between two dates

Date & Time.name: NOW
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of the current date and time

Date & Time.name: SECOND
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a second

Date & Time.name: TIME
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of a particular time

Date & Time.name: TIMEVALUE
Date & Time.description: Converts a time in the form of text to a serial number

Date & Time.name: TODAY
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of today’s date

Date & Time.name: WEEKDAY
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a day of the week

Date & Time.name: WEEKNUM
Date & Time.description: Returns the week number in the year

Date & Time.name: WORKDAY
Date & Time.description: Returns the serial number of the date before or after a specified number of workdays

Date & Time.name: YEAR
Date & Time.description: Converts a serial number to a year

Date & Time.name: YEARFRAC
Date & Time.description: Returns the year fraction representing the number of whole days between start_date and end_date

Engineering.name: BESSELI
Engineering.description: Returns the modified Bessel function In(x)

Engineering.name: BESSELJ
Engineering.description: Returns the Bessel function Jn(x)

Engineering.name: BESSELK
Engineering.description: Returns the modified Bessel function Kn(x)

Engineering.name: BESSELY
Engineering.description: Returns the Bessel function Yn(x)

Engineering.name: BIN2DEC
Engineering.description: Converts a binary number to decimal

Engineering.name: BIN2HEX
Engineering.description: Converts a binary number to hexadecimal

Engineering.name: BIN2OCT
Engineering.description: Converts a binary number to octal

Engineering.name: COMPLEX
Engineering.description: Converts real and imaginary coefficients into a complex number

Engineering.name: CONVERT
Engineering.description: Converts a number from one measurement system to another

Engineering.name: DEC2BIN
Engineering.description: Converts a decimal number to binary

Engineering.name: DEC2HEX
Engineering.description: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal

Engineering.name: DEC2OCT
Engineering.description: Converts a decimal number to octal

Engineering.name: DELTA
Engineering.description: Tests whether two values are equal

Engineering.name: ERF
Engineering.description: Returns the error function

Engineering.name: ERFC
Engineering.description: Returns the complementary error function

Engineering.name: GESTEP
Engineering.description: Tests whether a number is greater than a threshold value

Engineering.name: HEX2BIN
Engineering.description: Converts a hexadecimal number to binary

Engineering.name: HEX2DEC
Engineering.description: Converts a hexadecimal number to decimal

Engineering.name: HEX2OCT
Engineering.description: Converts a hexadecimal number to octal

Engineering.name: IMABS
Engineering.description: Returns the absolute value (modulus) of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMAGINARY
Engineering.description: Returns the imaginary coefficient of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMARGUMENT
Engineering.description: Returns the argument theta, an angle expressed in radians

Engineering.name: IMCONJUGATE
Engineering.description: Returns the complex conjugate of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMCOS
Engineering.description: Returns the cosine of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMDIV
Engineering.description: Returns the quotient of two complex numbers

Engineering.name: IMEXP
Engineering.description: Returns the exponential of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMLN
Engineering.description: Returns the natural logarithm of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMLOG10
Engineering.description: Returns the base-10 logarithm of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMLOG2
Engineering.description: Returns the base-2 logarithm of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMPOWER
Engineering.description: Returns a complex number raised to an integer power

Engineering.name: IMPRODUCT
Engineering.description: Returns the product of complex numbers

Engineering.name: IMREAL
Engineering.description: Returns the real coefficient of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMSIN
Engineering.description: Returns the sine of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMSQRT
Engineering.description: Returns the square root of a complex number

Engineering.name: IMSUB
Engineering.description: Returns the difference of two complex numbers

Engineering.name: IMSUM
Engineering.description: Returns the sum of complex numbers

Engineering.name: OCT2BIN
Engineering.description: Converts an octal number to binary

Engineering.name: OCT2DEC
Engineering.description: Converts an octal number to decimal

Engineering.name: OCT2HEX
Engineering.description: Converts an octal number to hexadecimal

Financial.name: ACCRINT
Financial.description: Returns the accrued interest for a security that pays periodic interest

Financial.name: ACCRINTM
Financial.description: Returns the accrued interest for a security that pays interest at maturity

Financial.name: AMORDEGRC
Financial.description: Returns the depreciation for each accounting period

Financial.name: AMORLINC
Financial.description: Returns the depreciation for each accounting period (the depreciation coefficient depends on the life of the assets)

Financial.name: COUPDAYBS
Financial.description: Returns the number of days from the beginning of the coupon period to the settlement date

Financial.name: COUPDAYS
Financial.description: Returns the number of days in the coupon period that contains the settlement date

Financial.name: COUPDAYSNC
Financial.description: Returns the number of days from the settlement date to the next coupon date

Financial.name: COUPNCD
Financial.description: Returns the next coupon date after the settlement date

Financial.name: COUPNUM
Financial.description: Returns the number of coupons payable between the settlement date and maturity date

Financial.name: COUPPCD
Financial.description: Returns the previous coupon date before the settlement date

Financial.name: CUMIPMT
Financial.description: Returns the cumulative interest paid between two periods

Financial.name: CUMPRINC
Financial.description: Returns the cumulative principal paid on a loan between two periods

Financial.name: DB
Financial.description: Returns the depreciation of an asset for a specified period, using the fixed-declining-balance method

Financial.name: DDB
Financial.description: Returns the depreciation of an asset for a specified period, using the double-declining-balance method or some other method that you specify

Financial.name: DISC
Financial.description: Returns the discount rate for a security

Financial.name: DOLLARDE
Financial.description: Converts a dollar price, expressed as a fraction, into a dollar price, expressed as a decimal number

Financial.name: DOLLARFR
Financial.description: Converts a dollar price, expressed as a decimal number, into a dollar price, expressed as a fraction

Financial.name: DURATION
Financial.description: Returns the annual duration of a security with periodic interest payments

Financial.name: EFFECT
Financial.description: Returns the effective annual interest rate

Financial.name: FVSCHEDULE
Financial.description: Returns the future value of an initial principal after applying a series of compound interest rates

Financial.name: INTRATE
Financial.description: Returns the interest rate for a fully invested security

Financial.name: IPMT
Financial.description: Returns the interest payment for an investment for a given period

Financial.name: IRR
Financial.description: Returns the internal rate of return for a series of cash flows

Financial.name: ISPMT
Financial.description: Returns the interest associated with a specific loan payment

Financial.name: MDURATION
Financial.description: Returns the Macauley modified duration for a security with an assumed par value of $100

Financial.name: MIRR
Financial.description: Returns the internal rate of return where positive and negative cash flows are financed at different rates

Financial.name: NOMINAL
Financial.description: Returns the annual nominal interest rate

Financial.name: NPER
Financial.description: Returns the number of periods for an investment

Financial.name: ODDFPRICE
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value of a security with an odd first period

Financial.name: ODDFYIELD
Financial.description: Returns the yield of a security with an odd first period

Financial.name: ODDLPRICE
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value of a security with an odd last period

Financial.name: ODDLYIELD
Financial.description: Returns the yield of a security with an odd last period

Financial.name: PRICE
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value of a security that pays periodic interest

Financial.name: PRICEDISC
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value of a discounted security

Financial.name: PRICEMAT
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value of a security that pays interest at maturity

Financial.name: PV
Financial.description: Returns the present value of an investment

Financial.name: RATE
Financial.description: Returns the interest rate per period of an annuity

Financial.name: RECEIVED
Financial.description: Returns the amount received at maturity for a fully invested security

Financial.name: SLN
Financial.description: Returns the straight-line depreciation of an asset for one period

Financial.name: SYD
Financial.description: Returns the sum-of-years’ digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period

Financial.name: TBILLEQ
Financial.description: Returns the bond-equivalent yield for a Treasury bill

Financial.name: TBILLPRICE
Financial.description: Returns the price per $100 face value for a Treasury bill

Financial.name: TBILLYIELD
Financial.description: Returns the yield for a Treasury bill

Financial.name: VDB
Financial.description: Returns the depreciation of an asset for a specified or partial period using a declining-balance method

Financial.name: XIRR
Financial.description: Returns the internal rate of return for a schedule of cash flows that is not necessarily periodic

Financial.name: XNPV
Financial.description: Returns the net present value for a schedule of cash flows that is not necessarily periodic

Financial.name: YIELD
Financial.description: Returns the yield on a security that pays periodic interest

Financial.name: YIELDDISC
Financial.description: Returns the annual yield for a discounted security, for example, a Treasury bill

Financial.name: YIELDMAT
Financial.description: Returns the annual yield of a security that pays interest at maturity

Financial.name: FV
Financial.description: Returns the future value of an investment

Financial.name: NPV
Financial.description: Returns the net present value of an investment based on a series of periodic cash flows and a discount rate

Financial.name: PMT
Financial.description: Returns the periodic payment for an annuity

Financial.name: PPMT
Financial.description: Returns the payment on the principal for an investment for a given period

Information.name: CELL
Information.description: Returns information about the formatting, location, or contents of a cell

Information.name: ERROR.TYPE
Information.description: Returns a number corresponding to an error type

Information.name: INFO
Information.description: Returns information about the current operating environment

Information.name: ISEVEN
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the number is even

Information.name: ISODD
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the number is odd

Information.name: N
Information.description: Returns a value converted to a number

Information.name: TYPE
Information.description: Returns a number indicating the data type of a value

Information.name: ISBLANK
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is blank

Information.name: ISERR
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is any error value except #N/A

Information.name: ISERROR
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is any error value

Information.name: ISLOGICAL
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is a logical value

Information.name: ISNA
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is the #N/A error value

Information.name: ISNONTEXT
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is not text

Information.name: ISNUMBER
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is a number

Information.name: ISREF
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is a reference

Information.name: ISTEXT
Information.description: Returns TRUE if the value is text

Lookup & Reference.name: ADDRESS
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns a reference as text to a single cell in a worksheet

Lookup & Reference.name: AREAS
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the number of areas in a reference

Lookup & Reference.name: COLUMN
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the column number of a reference

Lookup & Reference.name: COLUMNS
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the number of columns in a reference

Lookup & Reference.name: HLOOKUP
Lookup & Reference.description: Searches for a value in the top column of a table and then returns a value in the same column from a row you specify in the table

Lookup & Reference.name: HYPERLINK
Lookup & Reference.description: Creates a shortcut that opens a document on your hard drive, a server, or the Internet

Lookup & Reference.name: INDIRECT
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns a reference indicated by a text value

Lookup & Reference.name: MATCH
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the relative position of an item in an array

Lookup & Reference.name: OFFSET
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns a reference offset from a given reference

Lookup & Reference.name: ROWS
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the number of rows in a reference

Lookup & Reference.name: RTD
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns real-time data from a program that supports COM automation

Lookup & Reference.name: GETPIVOTDATA
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns data stored in a PivotTable

Lookup & Reference.name: CHOOSE
Lookup & Reference.description: Chooses a value from a list of values

Lookup & Reference.name: INDEX
Lookup & Reference.description: Uses an index to choose a value from a reference or array

Lookup & Reference.name: LOOKUP
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns a value either from a one-row or one-column range or from an array

Lookup & Reference.name: ROW
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the row number of a reference

Lookup & Reference.name: TRANSPOSE
Lookup & Reference.description: Returns the transpose of an array

Lookup & Reference.name: VLOOKUP
Lookup & Reference.description: Searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table and then returns a value in the same row from a column you specify in the table

Text.name: BAHTTEXT
Text.description: Converts a number to Baht text

Text.name: CHAR
Text.description: Returns the character specified by the code number

Text.name: CLEAN
Text.description: Removes all nonprintable characters from text

Text.name: CODE
Text.description: Returns a numeric code for the first character in a text string

Text.name: CONCATENATE
Text.description: Joins several text items into one text item

Text.name: DOLLAR
Text.description: Converts a number to text, using currency format

Text.name: EXACT
Text.description: Checks to see whether two text values are identical

Text.name: FIXED
Text.description: Formats a number as text with a fixed number of decimals

Text.name: LEFT
Text.description: Returns the leftmost characters from a text value

Text.name: LEN
Text.description: Returns the number of characters in a text string

Text.name: LOWER
Text.description: Converts text to lowercase

Text.name: MID
Text.description: Returns a specific number of characters from a text string, starting at the position you specify

Text.name: PROPER
Text.description: Capitalizes the first letter in each word of a text value

Text.name: REPLACE
Text.description: Replaces characters within text

Text.name: REPT
Text.description: Repeats text a given number of times

Text.name: RIGHT
Text.description: Returns the rightmost characters from a text value

Text.name: SEARCH
Text.description: Finds one text value within another (not case sensitive)

Text.name: SUBSTITUTE
Text.description: Substitutes new text for old text in a text string

Text.name: T
Text.description: Returns the text referred to by value

Text.name: TEXT
Text.description: Formats a number and converts it to text

Text.name: TRIM
Text.description: Removes excess spaces from text

Text.name: UPPER
Text.description: Converts text to uppercase

Text.name: VALUE
Text.description: Converts a text argument to a number

Text.name: FIND
Text.description: Finds one text value within another (case sensitive)
